title: How to Raise a Victim - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Betrayal   Boss-Subordinate Relationship   Cowardly Protagonist   Death   Devoted Love Interests   Different Social Status   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Game Elements   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Knights   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Yandere   Nobles   Psychopaths   Time Loop   Transmigration   Transported into a Game World   Weak Protagonist
author: Seram   세람
description:
“You must die now.”

Nigel was murdered by his loyal knight, Inas. For a moment, he despaired at that unbelievable fact. But when he woke up, he found he had gone back to the past.

“It’s alright, Nigel. See you again.”>
